title: Got an S but didnt get a chest?
body: Is this a bug? I haven't gotten a chest on the champ yet this season so why didn't i get one?

replies.body: Did you have any chest charges available at the time?

Go to your profile in the client:

Alpha client:
https://gyazo.com/234b3f10fd14053c59f3c5060f1a1fdb

Legacy Client:
https://gyazo.com/a71653bd0a067839c187964786d4cfcd

For me I have two chests available to earn and once I get both I have to wait 6 days for one more charge so I can get another.
So if i get another S on him can i get a chest or what
As long as you have a charge available.
